title: Slow cooked Moroccan style lamb shanks
ingredients: ['salt and pepper, to taste', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '8 lamb shanks', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '3 onions, chopped', '250ml lamb stock', '200ml water', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon ground coriander', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '2 teaspoons paprika', '2 teaspoons turmeric', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 carrots, sliced', '110g sultanas', '110g black pitted olives', 'chopped fresh coriander, to taste', 'chopped fresh mint, to taste']
